titles.title: Recognizing and honoring Joseph Henry for his significant and distinguished role in the development and advancement of science and electricity.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science.
Mrs. Morella moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Con. Res. 157.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 11/27/2001--Passed House without amendment. Recognizes and honors Joseph Henry for his significant and distinguished role in the development and advancement of science and electricity.
